content: smirky and spooky are light up ghosts that can be crocheted quickly this crochet project is beginner-friendly and a fun way to use up leftover yarn you can even use glow-in-the-dark yarn for an extra spooky twist these little ghosts would be so cute as halloween decorations and bring that magical vibe to any spooky setup i hope you will crochet this along with me gauge not critical finished size the finished size using worsted weight yarn and 4 5 mm crochet hook was 3 25 inches tall and 3 inches wide materials yarn 100% acrylic worsted weight yarn i used red heart super saver yarn in white you can substitute any yarn for this pattern and go down 1- 2 hook sizes from yarn recommendation hook 4 5 mm crochet hook scissors yarn needle stitch markers led lights/ led tea light/ string lights
